about_the_game: The new content keeps coming for NBA Playgrounds! With the Hot 'N Frosty expansion pack, you get eight new unlockable NBA rookies, three original playgrounds, three fresh tournaments, and three brand-spanking new balls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3 CPU 530 2.93GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0x compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.50 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670, similar or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0x compatible sound card
